text: Hilder Jobany Colón Alvarez is a Honduran professional footballer. He represented Honduras in the football competition at the 2012 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1989 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers at the 2012 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic footballers of Honduras Category:Honduran footballers Category:Honduras international footballers Category:Association footballers not categorized by position
title: Hilder Colón
